name: Polar Night
description:
(Now works on mobile!)

The "Polar Night" is a period of several weeks where areas within the Arctic Circle never see any sunlight. It's said that during this time, when the sunlight goes out... the trolls come out!

Defend your igloo against the trolls using a variety of traps. Survive 6 waves to win.

TRAPS:

  • BEAR TRAP - slows enemies for a short time, low damage
  • CAMPFIRE - burns enemies for several seconds, medium damage
  • HUNTER - shoots enemies from afar, low damage
  • TNT - explodes, destroying nearby enemies, high damage

This game was made for Trijam 60 (the 3-hour game jam). It over-ran a bit, and took more like 4 1/2 hours. All art + gameplay was made during the jam, the audio is from a royalty-free library.
